span.span: The type of the keys in the dictionary.
The type of the values in the dictionary.

summary.span: 表示可由多个线程同时访问的键/值对的线程安全集合。

span.span: Represents a thread-safe collection of key/value pairs that can be accessed by multiple threads concurrently.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对于非常大对象，您可以将最大数组大小增加到 2 千兆字节 (GB) 的 64 位系统上通过将配置元素设置为`true`在运行时环境中。For very large objects, you can increase the maximum array size to 2 gigabytes (GB) on a 64-bit system by setting the configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. > [!NOTE] > 实现并开头的接口[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，类未实现这些接口。 implements the and interfaces starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the class did not implement these interfaces. 像类，实现接口。Like the class, implements the interface. 此外，用于添加或更新在字典中，键/值对提供几种方法下, 表中所述。In addition, provides several methods for adding or updating key/value pairs in the dictionary, as described in the following table. |任务To do this|使用此方法Use this method|用法说明Usage notes| |----------------|---------------------|-----------------| |如果它尚不存在字典中向字典中，添加新的密钥Add a new key to the dictionary, if it doesn’t already exist in the dictionary||如果字典中当前不存在该键，则此方法将添加指定的键/值对。This method adds the specified key/value pair, if the key doesn’t currently exist in the dictionary. 该方法返回`true`或`false`具体取决于是否已添加新对。The method returns `true` or `false` depending on whether the new pair was added.| |如果该注册表项具有特定值，更新为现有键在字典中值Update the value for an existing key in the dictionary, if that key has a specific value||此方法检查是否该密钥具有指定的值，如果它，则用新值更新该键。This method checks whether the key has a specified value, and if it does, updates the key with a new value. 它相当于方法，它的用于字典元素不同。It's similar to the method, except that it's used for dictionary elements.| |无条件地，在字典中存储键/值对，并覆盖已存在的键的值Store a key/value pair in the dictionary unconditionally, and overwrite the value of a key that already exists|索引器的资源库： `dictionary[key] = newValue`The indexer’s setter: `dictionary[key] = newValue`|| |将键/值对添加到字典中，或如果密钥已存在，更新基于键的现有值的键的值Add a key/value pair to the dictionary, or if the key already exists, update the value for the key based on the key’s existing value|

- 或 -—or—

| 接受的密钥和两个委托。 accepts the key and two delegates. 它使用的第一个委托，如果键不存在字典; 中它接受键，并返回应添加的密钥的值。It uses the first delegate if the key doesn’t exist in the dictionary; it accepts the key and returns the value that should be added for the key. 如果在项存在; 它使用第二个委托它接受的键和其当前值，并返回新值应为键设置。It uses the second delegate if the key does exist; it accepts the key and its current value, and it returns the new value that should be set for the key.

接受键、 值添加，以及更新委托。 accepts the key, a value to add, and the update delegate. 这是上一重载相同，只不过它不使用委托来添加密钥。This is the same as the previous overload, except that it doesn't use a delegate to add a key.| |获取此键在字典中，将值添加到字典并将其返回如果该键不存在的值Get the value for a key in the dictionary, adding the value to the dictionary and returning it if the key doesn’t exist|

- 或 -—or—

|这些重载提供迟缓初始化为键/值对在字典中，仅当找不到添加的值。These overloads provide lazy initialization for a key/value pair in the dictionary, adding the value only if it’s not there.

采用要添加密钥不存在的值。 takes the value to be added if the key doesn’t exist.

将一个委托，它将生成值，如果不存在。 takes a delegate that will generate the value if the key doesn’t exist.| 所有这些操作是原子操作，并且是线程安全的所有其他操作方面类。All these operations are atomic and are thread-safe with regards to all other operations on the class. 唯一的例外是，它是接受一个委托，委托的方法和。The only exceptions are the methods that accept a delegate, that is, and . 修改和向字典中，写入操作使用细粒度锁定，以确保线程安全。For modifications and write operations to the dictionary, uses fine-grained locking to ensure thread safety. （在字典上的读取操作执行无锁方式。）但是，外部锁以避免出现问题造成的执行锁下的未知的代码调用这些方法的委托。(Read operations on the dictionary are performed in a lock-free manner.) However, delegates for these methods are called outside the locks to avoid the problems that can arise from executing unknown code under a lock. 因此，执行这些委托的代码不是受该操作的原子性。Therefore, the code executed by these delegates is not subject to the atomicity of the operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何构造对象。The following example shows how to construct a object. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.concurrentdictionary/cs/concdictionary.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.concurrentdictionary/vb/concdictionary.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公共和受保护成员是线程安全的可能从多个线程同时使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

threadsafe.span: 但是，通过一个接口访问成员实现，其中包括扩展方法不能保证是线程安全并可能需要由调用方同步。

span.span: However, members accessed through one of the interfaces the implements, including extension methods, are not guaranteed to be thread safe and may need to be synchronized by the caller.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该实例为空，具有默认的并发级别和默认的初始容量，并为键类型使用默认比较器。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty, has the default concurrency level, has the default initial capacity, and uses the default comparer for the key type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的并发级别的 Cpu 数量是默认并发乘数 (DEFAULT_CONCURRENCY_MULTIPLIER)。The default concurrency level is the default concurrency multiplier (DEFAULT_CONCURRENCY_MULTIPLIER) times the number of CPUs. 默认并发乘数越高，更多的并发写入操作可以发生而不会相互干扰和阻塞。The higher the default concurrency multiplier is, the more concurrent write operations can take place without interference and blocking. 更高版本的乘数值也会导致需要所有锁的操作 (例如，表重设大小，`ToArray`和`Count`) 以变得更高。Higher multiplier values also cause operations that require all locks (for example, table resizing, `ToArray` and `Count`) to become more expensive. 默认并发乘数是 4。The default concurrency multiplier is 4. 构造大型字典时，默认的容量 (DEFAULT_CAPACITY)，它表示初始存储桶数，是字典的非常小的大小和调整大小活动数之间进行权衡。The default capacity (DEFAULT_CAPACITY), which represents the initial number of buckets, is a trade-off between the size of a very small dictionary and the number of resizes when constructing a large dictionary. 此外，容量不应为整除小的质数。Also, the capacity should not be divisible by a small prime number. 默认的容量为 31。The default capacity is 31.

span.span: Uses the specified functions to add a key/value pair to the if the key does not already exist, or to update a key/value pair in the if the key already exists.

returns.span: 键的新值。

span.span: The new value for the key.

returns.span: 这将是 addValueFactory 的结果（如果缺少键）或 updateValueFactory 的结果（如果存在键）。

span.span: This will be either be the result of addValueFactory (if the key was absent) or the result of updateValueFactory (if the key was present).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您调用在不同线程上同时`addValueFactory`可能被调用多次，但其键/值对可能不会添加到每个调用的字典。If you call simultaneously on different threads, `addValueFactory` may be called multiple times, but its key/value pair might not be added to the dictionary for every call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从字典中返回的枚举器可以安全地使用与并发读取和写入字典中，但它不表示字典时刻快照。The enumerator returned from the dictionary is safe to use concurrently with reads and writes to the dictionary, however it does not represent a moment-in-time snapshot of the dictionary. 通过枚举器公开的内容可能包含字典后所做的修改调用。The contents exposed through the enumerator may contain modifications made to the dictionary after was called.

MemberSignature.Value: public TValue GetOrAdd (TKey key, Func<TKey,TValue> valueFactory);
.method public hidebysig instance !TValue GetOrAdd(!TKey key, class System.Func`2<!TKey, !TValue> valueFactory) cil managed
Public Function GetOrAdd (key As TKey, valueFactory As Func(Of TKey, TValue)) As TValue
public: TValue GetOrAdd(TKey key, Func<TKey, TValue> ^ valueFactory);
member this.GetOrAdd : 'Key * Func<'Key, 'Value> -> 'Value

param.name: key
param.span: 要添加的元素的键。

span.span: The key of the element to add.

param.name: valueFactory
param.span: 用于为键生成值的函数。

span.span: The function used to generate a value for the key.

summary.span: 如果该键不存在，则使用指定的函数将键/值对添加到 中；如果该键存在，则返回现有值。

span.span: Adds a key/value pair to the by using the specified function if the key does not already exist, or returns the existing value if the key exists.

returns.span: 键的值。

span.span: The value for the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于键/值可通过另一个线程时，插入`valueFactory`是生成一个值，您不能信任，只是因为`valueFactory`执行，它生成的值将插入到字典中并返回。Since a key/value can be inserted by another thread while `valueFactory` is generating a value, you cannot trust that just because `valueFactory` executed, its produced value will be inserted into the dictionary and returned. 如果您调用在不同线程上同时`valueFactory`可能被调用多次，但只有一个键/值对将添加到字典。If you call simultaneously on different threads, `valueFactory` may be called multiple times, but only one key/value pair will be added to the dictionary. 返回值取决于字典并将由另一个线程后插入一个键/值中的键是否存在之前调用`valueFactory`生成一个值：The return value depends on the presence of the key in the dictionary and whether a key/value is inserted by another thread after is called but before `valueFactory` generates a value: | 情况Scenario | 返回值Return value | | -------- | ------------ | | 密钥已在字典中。The key is already in the dictionary. | 返回现有值。The existing value is returned. | | 该密钥不在字典中。The key is not in the dictionary. `valueFactory` 生成一个值。`valueFactory` generates a value. 在重新检查的密钥，未找到键。On rechecking for the key, no key is found. | 键/值插入到字典中，并返回的值。The key/value is inserted into the dictionary, and the value is returned. | | 该密钥不在字典中。The key is not in the dictionary. `valueFactory` 生成一个值。`valueFactory` generates a value. 虽然`valueFactory`是生成值，另一个线程将插入该密钥的值。While `valueFactory` is generating the value, a different thread inserts a value for the key. 之后`valueFactory`执行和后重新检查的密钥，找到键被其他线程插入。After `valueFactory` executes and upon rechecking for the key, the key inserted by the other thread is found. | 返回由另一个线程插入的值。The value inserted by the other thread is returned. |

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 字典已包含最大数目的元素 ()。

span.span: The dictionary already contains the maximum number of elements ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从字典中返回的枚举器可以安全地使用与并发读取和写入字典中，但它不表示字典时刻快照。The enumerator returned from the dictionary is safe to use concurrently with reads and writes to the dictionary, however it does not represent a moment-in-time snapshot of the dictionary. 通过枚举器公开的内容可能包含字典后所做的修改调用。The contents exposed through the enumerator may contain modifications made to the dictionary after was called.
